item.title: Making alter switch mage books...? (HELP PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:171039"]Add this at case 132:

if (objectID == 6552) { // Ancient magic altar (temp !!!) if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 1) == true) { if (playerAncientMagics == true) { // setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = // 12855); // playerAncientMagics = false; setAnimation(645); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = // 12855); playerAncientMagics = true; setAnimation(645); } } }

Then add that object in objects.cfg[/quote]

What do I add in objects.cfg? Umm…I need some help also…If you can help, I will give you admin.

For some reason, I can’t add the stuff to make objects right…

Got messenger? MSN or Yahoo…?
PM me one of those, if you’re willing to help.

Read full topic
item.source: Making alter switch mage books...? (HELP PLZ)

item.title: Making alter switch mage books...? (HELP PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Add this at case 132:

if (objectID == 6552) { animation(435, absY, absX); setAnimation(645); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Then add that object in objects.cfg
